thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ABN Amro Reports Net Profit Of EUR 2,791 Million For FY 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ABN Amro Reports Net Profit Of EUR 2,791 Million For FY 2017
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Abn Amro Group Nv:
* REG-ABN AMRO PRESS RELEASE: ABN AMRO REPORTS NET PROFIT OF EUR 2,791 MILLION FOR FY 2017
* COST/INCOME RATIO FOR FY 2017 WAS 60.1% (FY 2016: 65.9%) * FINAL DIVIDEND OF EUR 0.80 PER SHARE IS PROPOSED * Q4 UNDERLYING NET PROFIT FOR THE PERIOD EUR 542 MILLION VERSUS EUR 480 MILLION IN REUTERS POLL
* Q4 OPERATING INCOME EUR 776 MILLION VERSUS EUR 723 MILLION IN REUTERS POLL
* END-Q4 FULLY-LOADED LEVERAGE RATIO 4.1‍​ PERCENT VERSUS 3.9 PERCENT YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
